title: Ground plus 1st Floor House For Sale
details: This is ground plus 1st Floor House in Marys Road ,Bambalapitiya,the Ground fFoor has 3 Bed rooms and Two Bath rooms.This has Sitting,Dining,and Kitchen..There is a Garage for 2 Vehicles.The 1st Floor has 3 Bed Rooms,2 Bath rRoms,Sitting,Dining and Kitchen.This is in highly residential area and inspection by appointment only.
